DOC.brief_title: STENTYS Self-expanding Versus Balloon-expandable Stent Acute Myocardial Infarction ( AMI )
DOC.detailed_description: Stent strut malapposition stent underexpansion common phenomenon AMI result change anatomy AMI occur ( thrombus dissolution , resolution spasm ) traditional balloon-expandable stent treatment . A self-expanding stent might lead well stent strut apposition follow contour vessel wall due self-expanding property . This might result good long term clinical outcome like low thrombosis rate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 18 year old . 2 . Acute Myocardial Infarction define presence least two three item : 1 . Detection rise cardiac biomarkers least one value 99th percentile upper reference limit ( URL ) 2 . Symptoms ischaemia ( chest pain ) > 20 minute 3 . ECG change indicative new ischaemia : new STT change ( ST deviation ≥0.2mV precordial lead and/or ≥0.1mV limb lead ) new LBBB ) 3 . Reperfusion expect achieve within 12 hour onset symptom 4 . Subject understands nature procedure provide write informed consent prior catheterization procedure . 5 . Subject willing comply specify followup evaluation contact telephone . 6 . Acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery . 7 . Male nonpregnant female subject . Angiographic 1 . Reference vessel diameter > 2.5mm < 4.0mm visual estimate . 2 . Target lesion < 30mm length visual estimate 1 . Currently enrol another investigational device drug study complete primary endpoint clinically interfere current study endpoint . 2 . Coronary cardiac intervention major surgery kind within 30 day prior procedure . 3 . Target vessel supplied bypass vessel 4 . Patients anticoagulation therapy ( Coumadin ) 5 . Patient receive thrombolytic therapy . 6 . Myocardial infarction due stent thrombosis , infarct lesion side previously implant stent 7 . Cardiogenic shock 8 . Any previous stent placement within 10mm ( proximal distal ) target lesion . 9 . Comorbid condition ( ) could limit subject 's ability participate study comply followup requirement , impact scientific integrity study . 10 . Concurrent medical condition life expectancy le 6 month . 11 . Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 30 % recent evaluation . 12 . Cerebrovascular accident transient ischemic attack last 6 month . 13 . Known hypersensitivity contraindication aspirin , heparin bivalirudin , clopidogrel ticlopidine , cobalt , nickel , sensitivity contrast medium , adequately premedicated . 14 . Known serum creatinine level > 2.5mg/dl presence history renal failure Angiographic 1 . Unprotected leave main coronary artery disease ( obstruction great 50 % leave main coronary artery protect least one nonobstructed bypass graft leave anterior descending ( LAD ) leave circumflex ( LCX ) artery branch thereof ) . 2 .
